title: Toronto city breaks are going from £439pp with flights in Canadian Affair's new sale
text:

Canadian Affair is giving Brits the chance to snap up a dreamy Canada holiday without breaking the bank in its latest sale.

The travel firm has slashed prices on Toronto city breaks, meaning you can currently bag three-night breaks from £439pp - and that includes your return flights too.

The deal is already live on the Canadian Affair website and there's quite a generous travel of window dates on offer until March 2020. (The cheapest prices are subject to availability).

Of course three nights is quite short, but the good news is that there are deals for those considering a longer itinerary too.

For example, the firm's Ontario Winter & Wine Holiday starts from £791pp and includes trips to Toronto and Niagara Falls, as well as a deluxe Niagara winery tour.

Looking for flights only? The sale also has direct return flights to Toronto from £327pp based on a London Gatwick departure.

(Image: Getty)

If you've never been to Toronto then you may want to check out our guide to the best things to see and do while you're there, but there are plenty of exciting additions during the months.

For example, if you're looking to use up the last of your annual leave, it's worth trying to book a trip between the 14th November and 22nd December to coincide with the Toronto Christmas Market which you'll find in the Toronto Distillery District.

Planning to kick off 2020 in style? The Toronto Symphony Orchestra will be offering up heaps of performances from the 8th-30th January, while the Toronto Sketch Comedy Festival from the 4th-15th March can be a fun way of exploring the city's arts scene.

Looking for more inspiration?

Thinking of going flights only and going for a wider Canadian getaway? We asked Air Transat's cabin crew to share their insider tips on their favourite Canadian cities, from the best places to eat to the sights you absolutely won't want to miss.

We've also got plenty of Canadian destination guides to the likes of Ottawa , Alberta , Halifax and British Columbia .
description: Canadian Affair has a deal on Toronto city breaks from £439pp for winter as well as cheap flight deals
